Electra (Or):

22 degrees
ON/OFF:             0x2603800A2             001001100000001110000000000010100010
Minus to 22:        0x603800A2                  01100000001110000000000010100010
Plus to 23:         0x604000A2                  01100000010000000000000010100010
Plus to 24:         0x604800A2                  01100000010010000000000010100010
Plus to 24:         0x606000AE                  01100000011000000000000010101110
fan to low:         0x406000AE                  01000000011000000000000010101110
fan to med:         0x506000AA                  01010000011000000000000010101010
fan to hig:         0x606000AA                  01100000011000000000000010101010
fan to auto:        0x706000AA                  01110000011000000000000010101010

Modes:
Low | 20
mode = cool:        0x40280096                  01000000001010000000000010010110
mode = heat:        0x80280096                  10000000001010000000000010010110



Tadiran (Tal):
28 Heat         0x462190C4          01000110001000011001000011000100
27 Heat         0x9D0207E8          10011101000000100000011111101000
26 Heat         0x8F8B950C          10001111100010111001010100001100
